text: Chondropomatus is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Chondropomatus include: *Chondropomatus latum (Gundlach in Pfeiffer, 1858) *Chondropomatus mimetica (Henderson & Bartsch, 1941) == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Chondropomatus
